name: Spyder
description: Spyder is a powerful interactive Python IDE. It's characterized with high-level code editing, interactive testing, debugging and so on. Meanwhile, it can mimic the "workspace" function of Matlab, you can adjust their position and size as you like.

en_US.description: Spyder is a powerful interactive Python IDE. It's characterized with high-level code editing, interactive testing, debugging and so on. Meanwhile, it can mimic the "workspace" function of Matlab, you can adjust their position and size as you like.
en_US.name: Spyder

zh_CN.description: Spyder是一个强大的交互式Python集成开发环境，它提供高级的代码编辑、交互测试、调试等特性，同时还可以模仿Matlab的“工作空间”的功能，根据自己的喜好调整它们的位置和大小。
zh_CN.name: Spyder
